events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your website but I would like to request a refund because it does not fit me and I do not want to keep it.
The customer's issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on their request for a money back due to size issues.
An agent was assigned to handle the refund request to provide assistance and next steps for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket you purchased.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or damaged in any way to proceed with the refund?
Thanks for the quick response! My order number is 987654321, and the jacket is in perfect condition, just the size doesn't fit me.
We can initiate the refund process immediately. Please send the jacket back using our prepaid return label, and once received, we will refund your payment within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you! I will send the jacket back today using the label you provide.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should be visible in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As your refund was successfully processed and there were no further issues reported, we are now closing your case. Have a great day!
